name: Jumpig Adventure
description:
Ler's jump with the Jumping in this crazy universe as far as possible.
Watch each of your jumps and think ahead!

Sounds easy?
Just try it!

Features:
- simple gameplay with easy controls 
- easy pace
- random generated levels
- crazy obstacles (volcano, circular saw, ...)
- crazy platforms (hiding, moving, ...)
- global leaderboards
- skins (Batpig, Superpig, ... and more are coming)

How to play:
- tap on the left side of the display to jump left
- tap on the right side of the display to jump right
- double-tap on the left side of the display to jump left by two platforms
- double-tap on the right side of the display to jump right by two platforms
